GapFillDragDrop.Title: Wordspot: do
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Choose an answer and drag it to the correct space.

Content.Question:
1. I don’t mind doing the ironing in general but I hate doing shirts.
2. Do your homework then you can go out to play.
3. Sue’s trying to save up to buy a car so she’s doing a lot of overtime at the moment.
4. If I cook, will you do the shopping? I’ve got a list of things I need.
5. Craig doesn’t think he’ll get the job because he did badly at the interview.
6. Jenny has just finished doing law at university.
7. Beth is doing an English course at college next year.
8. I’m not sure if I’ll pass the exam but I’ll do my best.
9. After work, I just want to relax and do nothing.
10. Men have to do two years’ military service in my country.
